features: Dial Time: Applied indices and a rotating dial ring that acts as a timer.
Classic: 40mm case with a 4 o'clock crown for time and a 2 o'clock crown for rotating dial.
Durable Comfort: Tapered custom solid stainless steel 3-link bracelet with double locking clasp with micro adjust
tech_specs.\u2022 Watch Dial: The dial features applied indices, custom molded hands, and a rotational dial ring that acts as a timer
tech_specs.\u2022 Watch Case: 40mm, 100M/10ATM, Custom stainless steel case, hardened mineral crystal, 4 o'clock crown for time, 2 o'clock crown for timer, stainless steel caseback, and spring pin lugs
tech_specs.\u2022 Watch Band: 22mm-20mm tapered custom solid stainless steel, 3 link free-swing bracelet and solid stainless steel double locking clasp with micro adjust.
